section: Client acknowledges and agrees that all due dates set forth in the Scope of Work are guaranteed by the Company, regardless of whether the company receives required materials, documentation, or approvals in a timely fashion from the client. Delays will not affect the due dates.
explanation: This section is contradictory and structurally flawed. It states that due dates are guaranteed by the Company regardless of whether the company receives required materials, documentation, or approvals in a timely fashion from the client, and that Delays will not affect the due dates. This doesn't make sense because in order for work to be completed, documentation has to be provided by the client. This would render it impossible for the company to meet the deadline.

section: Client shall make a prepayment of $1,900 and pay the remaining $3,100 on completion of the Scope of Work. However, the Client can pay the remaining amount at any time, or in multiple installments, before the Scope of Work completion.
explanation: This section is contradictory. It initially states that the remaining balance of $3,100 is due 'on completion of the Scope of Work.' However, the added sentence allows the client to pay 'at any time, or in multiple installments, before the Scope of Work completion.' This creates ambiguity as to when the final payment is actually due.

section: Company is obligated to continue providing Customer Service throughout the duration of this agreement, and may not alter or cease providing Customer Service. Company at its sole discretion may at any time alter or cease providing the Customer Service which it has agreed to provide to Client relating to Client Website pursuant to this Agreement without any liability to Company.
explanation: This section presents a clear contradiction. It initially states that 'Company is obligated to continue providing Customer Service...and may not alter or cease providing Customer Service.' Then, it immediately contradicts this by stating 'Company at its sole discretion may at any time alter or cease providing the Customer Service...without any liability to Company.'
